name: Stormvault

effects.description: Conjures pursuing storm for 6s dealing 22.5% base damage + 203 every 0.5s
Conjures a storm that deals 40% base damage per second to enemies within its radius. Additionally, lightning strikes periodically hit enemies, dealing 100% base damage
